title: Hataraku Maou-sama! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Adopted Children   Angels   Antihero Protagonist   Apartment Life   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Archery   Artifacts   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Bickering Couple   Childcare   Co-Workers   Cute Children   Demon Lord   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Enemies Become Allies   Farming   Gate to Another World   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Humanoid Protagonist   Kidnappings   Loyal Subordinates   Magic   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Money Grubber   Multiple Identities   Multiple Protagonists   Mysterious Past   Naive Protagonist   Parallel Worlds   Past Plays a Big Role   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Schemes And Conspiracies   Strong Love Interests   Technological Gap   Transported to Another World   Tsundere   World Tree
author: Wagahara Satoshi   和ヶ原聡司
description: After being soundly thrashed by the hero Emilia, the Devil King and his general beat a hasty retreat to a parallel universe…only to land plop in the middle of bustling, modern-day Tokyo! Lacking the magic necessary to return home, the two are forced to assume human identities and live average human lives until they can find a better solution. And to make ends meet, Satan finds gainful employment at a nearby fast food joint! With his devilish mind set on working his way up the management food chain, what will become of his thirst for conquest?!>
